name: Bubble Focus
description:
Test and sharpen your powers of focus, memory and concentration now.

Bubble will keep moving across color blocks and it will stop and disappear suddenly. You objective is to focus on the bubble and see if you can remember the last location of the bubble.

Game Center leaderboards.
Endless game.
Universal game: iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch.
